We have 100% uptime guarantee in your st: We have 100% uptime guarantee in your stakes. You are compensated for any loss that originated from our actions. We are very confident that we will never miss a block, but isn’t it reassuring to know that it’s impossible to lose with node101?
By using the trustless auto restake tool: By using the trustless auto restake tool we provide, you can maximize your gain with compound reward mechanisms. We restake the tokens you receive periodically and help you make most of your regular income.
When you choose to auto restake with nod: When you choose to auto restake with node101, you do not need to worry about the additional transaction fees coming from restaking orders. We take care of them for you. Why? Because you deserve the best.
Just stake and forget about your coins…: Just stake and forget about your coins… Not always a good idea, right? With node101 newsletter, you can get the latest news weekly. Wouldn’t it be nice to read about your investments sunday morning with a cup of coffee?
Hundreds of chains, tens of wallets, and: Hundreds of chains, tens of wallets, and a lot to learn just to stake in a single chain… We maximize your staking experience with our interface, allowing you to stake with just a click. Just hit the “stake with us” button,

. We are waiting to hear from you.
